uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.sal.manager

Class IntegratedComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.sal.manager.IntegratedComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    iServeComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiscoveryEngineImpl, DocumentManagerFileSystem, KnowledgeBaseManagerSparql, NfpManagerSparql, RegistryManagerImpl, ServiceManagerSparql

    public abstract class IntegratedComponent
extends Object
implements iServeComponent
    IntegratedComponent is an abstract class for iServe Components that ensures that the components are interconnected through an internal communication EventBus. iServe Components should extend this class for ensuring adequate communication across modules.
    Since:
    06/09/2013
    Author:
    Carlos Pedrinaci (KMi - The Open University)
